subject: Fwd: change
body:
Hello,

Life Should be Full of Luxuries, yet, only a handful of people can afford the finest products, the luxuries of the elite.
We are committed to bringing you the finest products, at prices incomparably lower. Perfectly crafted luxury timepieces, all at affordable prices. Thousands of different models to choose from!

http://www.presisra.com/

The finest of products, at the lowest of prices:

http://www.presisra.com/

Andrea Saint James, a USC nursing student, was pronounced dead on arrival at Mercy Hospital in North Los Angeles last night, the apparent victim of a bizarre accident. From some final stronghold of sanity and evaluative clarity the rational Paul Sheldon had thought: She looks like a widow who just got cute after a ten-year dry spell.

Sincerely,
Harold Rogers
